root.name: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? Back to School
root.description: OverviewAre You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? Back to School is a trivia game show game developed and published by THQ for the Wii and Nintendo DS platforms.Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? Back to School is based on the TV game show Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? The game is based on the later version of the TV show which is quicker paced and was meant to fit into a half hour rather than an hour.
